NumVertexShaderInstructions: Number of instructions used by most expensive vertex shader in the material
NumPixelShaderInstructions: Number of instructions used by most expensive pixel shader in the material
NumSamplers: Number of samplers required by the material
NumVertexTextureSamples: Number of textures sampled by the vertex shader
NumPixelTextureSamples: Number of textures sampled by the pixel shader
NumUVScalars: Number of interpolator scalars required for UVs
NumInterpolatorScalars: Number of interpolator scalars required for user-defined interpolators
